title: BRIEF-Enbridge Re-Affirms Plan To Proceed With Contracting Of The Mainline System
text:
BRIEF-Enbridge Re-Affirms Plan To Proceed With Contracting Of The Mainline System

Economy 3 hours ago (Sep 29, 2019 15:40)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Enbridge Re-Affirms Plan To Proceed With Contracting Of The Mainline System Sept 29 (Reuters) - Enbridge Inc : * ENBRIDGE RE-AFFIRMS PLAN TO PROCEED WITH CONTRACTING OF THE MAINLINE SYSTEM AND FILE REGULATORY APPLICATION BY YEAR END * ENBRIDGE INC SAYS ENBRIDGE WILL FILE AN APPLICATION WITH THE CANADA ENERGY REGULATOR SEEKING APPROVAL OF A FIRM SERVICE OFFERING AS SOON AS PRACTICAL

BRIEF-Enbridge Re-Affirms Plan To Proceed With Contracting Of The Mainline System
description: BRIEF-Enbridge Re-Affirms Plan To Proceed With Contracting Of The Mainline System
